EmailTemplate.name: Claim Email Reply Deny
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation notification for ({Case.Name})
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hello {!Claimant}, Thank you for your timely response to our request. You have responded that the wage claim submitted on your behalf by {!advocate/rep} against {!Defendant} on {!filed date} is to be DENIED. We have closed the pending case and there will be no further action by the Labor Commissionerâ€™s office. If you have any questions or concerns about your decision, please call us at 833-LCO-INFO (833-526-4636) Labor Commissioner's Office
